reviews.text: Had a great last-minute-planned stay at the callas hotel. The room despite not looking much was very comfy and I got plenty of rest ! Thanks for the receptionnists kindness. 8 min from the train station and a view of the cathedral ! (although the bell rings for 5 min at 7am, be warned aha)

A good room in a great location at a great price. The people behind the desk were super friendly and helpful. Nothing wrong with the rooms but they were very basic: clean, comfortable and safe. Walk out the front door and the cathedral and high-streets are right there. Would stay again for the convenient location and price.

Very close to Koln Central Station and Cathedral.
It is an old style hotel between shops in Hohe Street.
Too bad that the elevator is broken said the receptionist, so we took stairs to our room in level 2 while lobby is on level zero.
The room quite spacious with window, very basic, and no electric kettle.
But we enjoyed Koln and very easy going here and there while staying there.

Very nice place in the heart of Cologne.  Short walk to the dome and main train station.  Small, clean rooms with all you need. Very reasonably priced, good simple breakfast offering enough choices, again at a very reasonable cost.  Very friendly and helpful staff.  Looking forward to coming back on one of my future business trips.

It's a few minutes walk to the cathedral which is great. It is basically in the middle of a shopping plaza which is not so great. The quality of the rooms is probably fine for a solo traveller without high expectations. For anyone with a family the noise from the shopping plaza continued until the church bells started going off at 6am and in the summer it was too hot to close the windows.
